title: TPG and League of Legends has lately been bad..
body: Every time i try to play the game. In the loading screen it goes black, then it says there was a connection error. It's been happening since yesterday and it's really annoying. For some reason when the loading screen pops up, when I ult tab it still shows the league of legends logo in the middle of my screen. I don't know what's happening but maybe its TPG, however all my other friends can access it fine. Someone please help. I've tried restarting. It's been happening since 4pm yesterday.
